classification.task_goal: Create a text-based Excel sheet and execute user-defined formulas.
primary_constraints: Respond only with the text-based Excel sheet format.
Execute user-defined formulas and provide results in the same format.
classification.reasoning: The assistant initially failed to maintain the format and constraints by not providing the requested text-based Excel sheet in the desired format. However, the user corrected the assistant's output by specifying the required format multiple times, leading to a successful repair of the constraints.
